name: Life Goes On (itch)
description:
(Play in full screen for best results.)

Controls: [WASD] to move, [E] to interact, [G] to view goals

Life Goes On is a  narrative game exploring sadness in the context of agency. You wake up in the hospital, unsure of what's wrong with you. Explore the ward, speak to other patients, and await news of your condition in this exploration of human helplessness. Do your best to maintain optimism while the world slowly leaves you behind.

Original work from Quinn Barker-Plummer (writing, UI programming and design), Hanae El Mansouri (asset creation and animation), and Edward Hsu (back-end programming). 

Quinn BP: https://qbarkerp.com/, @quinnbp3

Hanae El Mansouri: http://hanae.elmansouri.com/, @hanaeelmansour

Edward Hsu: https://www.etbedward.com/, @EdwardH18361544
